person.persName: James Herd (Clay County, Kentucky, sheriff, private, and captain (C.S.A.))

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, sheriff and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Elijah Herd and Elizabeth Herd. Married to Martha Wilson Herd in Clay County, Kentucky, on November 27, 1851. Father of Elizabeth Herd and Sarah Herd. Resident of Clay County, Kentucky, in 1850. Sheriff of Clay County in 1857. Sheriff of Clay County in 1860. Served in the Fifth Kentucky Mounted Infantry (C.S.A.) as private from 1862 to 1863. Served in the 13th Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.) as captain and recruiting officer from 1863 to 1865. Paroled on April 30, 1865.
